H0.text: On what island would you find the city of Palermo. Corsica

H1.text: On what island would you find the city of Palermo. Sardinia

H2.text: On what island would you find the city of Palermo. Crete

H3.text: On what island would you find the city of Palermo. Sicily

A4.text: Palermo is in northwestern Sicily, by the Gulf of Palermo in the Tyrrhenian Sea.

A5.text: The city is the capital of both the autonomous region of Sicily and the Metropolitan City of Palermo.

A6.text: Sicily is an island in the central Mediterranean Sea.
